website_summaries.verdict: This is a 6-pack of articulated animal mobs. Kids love collecting these for play or display.
pros: Realistic replica of the mobs seen in the game
Kids of all ages enjoy them
cons: These toys are very small and can get lost easily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Minecraft Animal Mobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Minecraft animals toy six pack for my son's birthday , so I can decorate his cake that I made. This pack includes Chicken, Ocelot, Tame Wolf, Pig, Sheep, & Cow. Each animal features a pixilated design with moving parts. Each of them do different move. Chicken - head turns and wings flap, Pig- head turns, legs move and can sit down. Every of them is doing something. After the party my some clean the animal and took them to his room. He loves to play Minecraft on him PC. So these Animal are on his desk right now.
customer_reviews.author: m78agda

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Minecraft obsessed 7yo for Christmas, and I was not disappointed! She was overjoyed with each figure, and I'm pleased with the quality of them - they don't appear easy to break or damage, so it's great for some non-screen time, while still letting her keep her Minecraft theme going. They are pretty cute too.The paint jobs are good, the different sizes are great and on par with the expected sizes, and each has a little bit of movement to it. She loves each one. The price is right, as all 6 cost about the same as 1-2 animal figures that we usually get her. Great toys for the Minecraft generation :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Leitch

customer_reviews.title: The little animals' legs move in and out so it's kind of like they're walking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my six year old son for his birthday this year. He loves it! The little animals' legs move in and out so it's kind of like they're walking, that's super cute. They are decent sized, compared to little Steve characters. The different animals look exactly like on the show. My son is loving playing with them alongside his Steve character building little Minecraft villages in real life rather than just digital. Super cute little toys! My son was very happy with them. These make a great gift for the little Minecraft lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Great set but I have a suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It's extremely durable and is completely articulated. Each animal looks like it does in the game. The ocelot's tail looks like it could come off, and it can. It came out when being played with, but it was attached to a small round ball and could easily be put back in, so don't worry about that! I do have a few suggestions though, because for 20$, it should come with more. I think it should come with 2 wheat, 1 seed, 1 pork chop, 1 carrot, and 1 fish for the animals. I wouldn't mind paying 5$ extra for the set if it came with these.
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Big winner !
customer_reviews.text: Got here quickly and look great .My son loves them and is so happy o got them for him .The colors are good and they are made well.The heads can be turn and legs can be push in,those little details mattered so much to my son which made him more happy.I will be buying another set for my other child who is autisic because he really enjoy's it even more .Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Such an Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such an Amazing buy!!! It is so much more beautiful in real life! It has Very beautiful box, if you need it for a present, The animals are not tiny and with a lot of little squares on them, very cool! All of the animals do things: sheep can "jump" - it moves up and down on it's legs, all of them turn their heads, some of them turn tails. They are fun! My little Minecraft fun, 7 y.o. is in love with them!! I am very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya Collins

customer_reviews.title: They are nice for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale to compliment my daughter's Minecraft set, but I would have been a bit irritated if I'd paid full price. They are nice for what they are, small plastic shapes, but not worth full price. Most of them fit into the collectible cube playset, except for the larger sheep and pig, I think, which instead fit into the rear play area of the cube. They are all cute and friendly looking. Except the chicken. Which is evil. Don't turn your back on it.
customer_reviews.author: PAPASTAG

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME REPLICA OF MINECRAFT FIGURE
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME REPLICA OF MINECRAFT FIGURE. GRANDKIDS LOVES IT, BUT DON'T LET THEM TAKE THE HEAD OFF TO MAY TIMES BECAUSE THEN IT BECOMES VERY LOOSE AND WOBBLES.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Blagg

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft Craze
customer_reviews.text: I am not really sure about why the mine craft toys are in so much demand, but I got this as a gift for my nephew. He really enjoys minecraft and liked this toy. I feel like the value you get for the price isn't really right - but overall if you have a kiddo that's obsessed with minecraft this will do the trick! It comes with six different characters, all of which he was excited about. Like I said, not really sure why kids are so into minecraft but they are.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C

customer_reviews.title: My son has been begging for this Minecraft animal set ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been begging for this Minecraft animal set for a couple months. I finally bought it for his 6th birthday and he loves it. I got a small container for his Minecraft figures and he takes it everywhere, even in the car. It's a strong plastic, not too big or too small. The moving joints on the animals also work well and don't come off at all. I would definitely buy this again, i actually am for my 8 year old son too!
customer_reviews.author: mandiloohoo

customer_reviews.title: The kids enjoy playing Minecraft a little too much on the computer ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids enjoy playing Minecraft a little too much on the computer so I got them A couple of characters nice size and there off the computer for a while playing with the toys I find these characters a little expensive but it distract them off the computer
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my nephew who loves Minecraft. He used them with his other toys and they didn’t break in the years he’s had them.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,but more display set than toys
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in to Minecraft and was trilled to receive this set for Christmas. She likes the figures but wishes there were more moving parts to play with. So, the set is more suitable for display or decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Cute animals!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to put on my grandson's cake who turned 6. Every child there wanted one!! A nice size to play with. Wouldn't recommend for younger children as they may prove to be a chocking hazard, but were great for 5-6 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: NanaRita

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them :)
customer_reviews.text: A must have for any Minecraft fanatics. My 6 year old loves these figures and plays with them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other Minecraft figures we have bought, these looked cute AND held up to constant rough play from my 3 boys. A year later, they are all still in one piece and look like new.
customer_reviews.author: KristinTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These were a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value for the money! My three year old is a big fan of Minecraft and absolutely loves these animals! He uses them to play with his little Minecraft figures and blocks that he also got for Christmas. The legs on most of the animals can move and some of their tails even move. They are made with hard plastic so are a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my sons Birthday
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my son's Cake for for his 14th Birthday he loves them. After the party we cleaned them then he took them to his room and set them on his table with other figurines
customer_reviews.author: Verna Naugle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the younger Minecraft player.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves playing with these, using his imagination for play when he's not playing Minecraft online....
customer_reviews.author: kathleen j gyuran

customer_reviews.title: Dig a little, farm a little..
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little set. It has a great number of Minecraft animals that keep both my 8 year old and 10 year old pretty well occupied when paired with some of their other Minecraft sets. I purchased these from Amazon because their price was around $5 cheaper than any place local and then used it as an incentive for doing household chores. They are adorable and we're all very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 5rupples

customer_reviews.title: My nephew's favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for one of my nephews for Christmas. He's so big into Minecraft it's ridiculous! After opening all the gifts, I asked him if he had a good Christmas and he said, "Yes, but my Minecraft toys are my favorite!" I mentioned to my sister that it was really sweet that he said that because I thought he was trying to make me feel good. She said he isn't like that and if he said that, he meant that! That's when you know you did good!! He still loves and I've been told he still plays with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M

customer_reviews.title: siblings love it
customer_reviews.text: bought as a christmas present for my minecraft addicted siblings needless to say, they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: its a great Minecraft addition - My boy loves it
customer_reviews.text: great Hard plastic toys read may be hazardous for baby's or young ones as choking hazard
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved this and scream when he opened it He didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this and scream when he opened it He didn't have a single one of them and couldn't believe he got that many of them We made his day He hasn't put them down since
customer_reviews.author: Mary Denise Aldaya

customer_reviews.title: great for birthday cake and play
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Minecraft animals to decorate my 7yr old son's birthday cake and he has enjoyed playing with them afterwards. They are well made and they have moveable parts. Each animal's body parts move differently so this adds interest. For example the sheep has springs inside it's legs so that you can push on the back of the sheep and it springs back up; other animals' legs move differently.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My four and six yr old grandkids love these things
customer_reviews.text: My four and six yr old grandkids love these things. Very durable product my 4 yr old grandson won't let go of the chicken for some reason...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: but he was happy that some of the animals
customer_reviews.text: My son picked these out in one of the big box stores. I was able to get them at a more reasonable price through Amazon. They don't really "do" anything, but he was happy that some of the animals, such as the chicken, had moveable parts.
customer_reviews.author: Addie K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves Minecraft so when I saw this 6 pack of Minecraft Animal Toy's on sale, I didn't think twice about purchasing. My package arrived fast, on time and is exactly what the description entails. The figures are the perfect size, not too small and not too big! I can't wait to see my son's face on Christmas morning, I know he's going to love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: 6 YO Daughter Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo loved getting and playing with these. They were exactly what she wanted! She loves playing MC on our phones or computer. I wanted to get her MC stuff she could play with in real life, so it wasn't just electronics, electronics, electronics all the time. It worked. She plays with the figures making up all sorts of stories. Good quality and delivered on time. A little expensive if you ask me , but I guess if your child adores something you pay extra if you can.
customer_reviews.author: tlove34

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Minecraft toys
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Minecraft fanatic and he loves these toys! He got this 6 pack and another 6 pack of Minecraft toys for Christmas and has since expanded his collection with other toys that are now available. The toys are well-made and sturdy---they can put up with what a 7 year old puts them through!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I feel like when I rate a product and / or a ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like when I rate a product and / or a seller as excellent, I am confused as to why I must submit a comment, so I just say lots of things like this. There's nothing more to say, this product was as expected, I did not contact the seller, and everything arrived right on time. This is all I have to say. This is all I have to say. This is all I have to say. This is all I have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft dolls
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter loves playing this Minecraft game on the computer. So when she got the characters that are in the game, she was really excited. They are a nice size dolls except that one of them is quite small and I would not want it near a young child, but otherwise they are good looking and represent the game characters well.
customer_reviews.author: Ceil

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They’re tiny little things but I read the dimensions before I bought so I already knew that. Daughter wanted them and she loves them on her dresser
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Minecraft products are horribly overpriced for what you get, but my daughter chose to spend her saved chore money on this set. It makes her immensely happy, most of the pieces have some special adorable function beyond looking like a Minecraft animal. The pieces haven't broken, they still look new despite much abuse. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: vamommy

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: Used them as party gifts at my 8 year olds birthday. Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: name pen

customer_reviews.title: and jazware seems to survive the wear and tear of children the best. These were super cute
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of knock off Minecraft toys floating out on amazon and elsewhere, and jazware seems to survive the wear and tear of children the best. These were super cute, and the little boy that got them really enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Wife

customer_reviews.title: Kids love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids at Christmas and they love them. They aren't quite old enough to really play the game yet but this give them a way to play with something they are familiar with. The figures are pretty good representations of the game and with some adjustable parts they can be posed a bit. Would recommend these for kids that love Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also like that the legs move and snap on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these Minecraft toys. They are bathtub toys at our house. They are big enough to play with but not too small either. I also like that the legs move and snap on. My daughter thought she had broke a leg off the other day and I just snapped it right back on. Perfect, disaster adverted!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to other Mincraft toys
customer_reviews.text: My kids were excited to receive these as they have recently gotten into Minecraft and enjoy the characters and the game. They have been playing with the animals as well as the Steve they received.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Van Derveer

customer_reviews.title: He really liked this set and it feels durable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the big deal is with Minecraft, but my son loves it! He really liked this set and it feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: InspiredbyDemi

customer_reviews.title: adorable pack of animals and they have moving joints
customer_reviews.text: well made, adorable pack of animals and they have moving joints!
customer_reviews.author: Tarapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this toy pack. They immediately started discussing the virtues of each animal and played with them for awhile.They also discussed how true each animal's likeness to the game it was and also how they must have designed the pig before the Spring 2014 update to the game. My word! Yes, my children are deep into Minecraft. Ages 11 (girl) and 8 (boy).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Courage

customer_reviews.title: My nephews love them!
customer_reviews.text: Minecraft is HUGE I our family. My daughter and my two nephews (6 & 7 years old) both wanted this Minecraft Animal toy pack. The toys look just like the animals in the game, and are good quality. Since my nephews love them, they each got a six pack of them from me & they are thrilled! I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jen.M

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to drop it and watch it bounce around
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. The sheep's legs are on a spring for some reason. It is fun to drop it and watch it bounce around.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan S.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great toys! My daughter absolutely loves these! They are well made and my kids have played for hours with them! They really enjoy them! I think it is a great birthday present! I have 3 kids ages 7-9 and they play often with these! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: and can break rather easily, so the kids MUST be careful with them
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for our 7 yo son. He loves these minecraft toys, and was more than excited to get them for xmas. They are fragile, and can break rather easily, so the kids MUST be careful with them, which isn't always the case. When they break, they are sad, of course, which has happened many times with these cheap, but loved toys.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cowdell

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and they loved it. Great price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MTank411

customer_reviews.title: Your child will love these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandson's birthday. He is 6. You should have seen the faces of my grandson and his friends light up when he opened my package! They immediately started playing with them and were thrilled! The figurines are larger than the mini ones, just the right size to hold in your hand and play with. I think he was very pleased with the gift!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Minecraft birthday cake decorations
customer_reviews.text: I used these characters on my son's birthday cakes and it turned out great. I used a regular rectangular glass pan to make the cake and these figures fit nicely on top. Now my son has them as a room decoration. Good size, sturdy toys.
customer_reviews.author: NoVAKim

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy playing with these.
customer_reviews.text: Great add-on for kids to play with the Minecraft playset. The very small blind bag toys are also good for the playset.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L. Hammann

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fun toys for my 10 year old. He loves Minecraft
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Creates Great Imaginary Play!
customer_reviews.text: The way these are made they remind me of a Lego guy. Square, box looking, hard plastic. But these are sturdy and solid, great size, great detail on the animals and characters. It creates a lot of fun imaginary play for my 7 year old. Perfect for the Minecraft junkie!
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Old McMinecraft had a farm
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my 10 year old daughter's minecraft toys. She loves animals so this was perfect! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: vacar

customer_reviews.title: After One Day...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loved this but one day after having it the tail broke off one of the animals! (The spotted one). The tail is very thin compared to the other animals. You are suppose to be able to move it up and down and when she moved it up, it broke. I tried gluing it but it keeps breaking. I contacted the manufacture but am waiting for a reply. Amazon did great on the packaging and shipment of the product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Galligan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Cute Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute gift! My brother likes Minecraft so I thought I would get him the animals from the game. The animals are a little bit discolored and pixelated compared to the game but the actual design of the animals are spot on. He's going to love setting these up in his room. Very cute purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: one of my son's favorite sets of toys
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves these so much. He got the from Christmas along with a few other sets of toys and papercraft sets. He sets them up and creates his own Minecraft world. It did as I was hoping. It got him out of the game and into his imagination more. I have more Minecraft toys like this ordered for his birthday. They are a huge hit over here.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ay

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my 6 yr old grandson, he likes them
customer_reviews.author: Jean E Schwetje

customer_reviews.title: Large figures
customer_reviews.text: They are cute. But extremely larger than expected. Not the normal mine craft 'Steve' size figures
customer_reviews.author: TraceyNono

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: I love this adorable set and this will be under the Christmas tree. I'm probably going to have to run out and buy another one to avoid possible squabbling between my children, as one child likes to play with the figures and the other child will want to keep them in the box for display.
customer_reviews.author: JKReads

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter for christmas and she was so happy. she is a big mine craft person
customer_reviews.text: i got these for my daughter for christmas and she was so happy. she is a big mine craft person. all she ever does is play that game. very good quality toys and she really does love them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: candida ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Greate as cake toppers and toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a cake topper for my son's birthday, and he loved it! they also are very well put together and works well as a standard action figures
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Smart

customer_reviews.title: "It is the best Christmas present ever
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what the big deal is with this set, but my 6 yr old grandson jumped in the air, danced around the room and, screamed, "It is the best Christmas present ever!" Three days later it was still his favorite gift. Anything that will hold a 6 yr. old's attention for 3 days is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a birthday cake topper for my sons cake. They we’re small, but perfect to add a little flair to his Minecraft cake.
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: Addition to my game
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my grandson at Christmas. He has the Minecraft game, but did not have the animals. I was very happy to have found these, so I could get them for him. I am sure he will like this very much. I was very happy to receive this package so quickly, so I can get it sent off to him.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: My son, the minecraft fanatic, loves his minecraft animals. They are my personal favorite out of the other minecraft toys he has because they are much more sturdy than other mincraft toys we have bought him. Also not tiny removal parts! good sizes too.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra richeson

customer_reviews.title: Great cake decorations
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my son's minecraft birthday cake decorations. Worked out great and made a bonus gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: Happy brother
customer_reviews.text: Little brother was so happy to get this as one of his many gifts. He likes the animals from Minecraft a lot
customer_reviews.author: Estefani Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These Minecraft Animals are so adorable! They can move some of the parts, and they are very authentic to the actual game. They are small, the Ocelot being barely and inch high, but my boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Son, 8, love these Minecraft mini figures. While we control and monitor the amount of game time he has, these mini figures help keep his mind active while away from the TV screen. Alongside the myriad of Minecraft books he has read it keeps him imaginative.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Really cute. Good toy!
customer_reviews.text: Present for a 9-year-old Minecraft fan. He loves it. The pieces can come apart, but they snap back together easily. The articulation is limited, but a kinda accurate representation of the game physics. Some of the animals have cute springy legs.
customer_reviews.author: Caligo

customer_reviews.title: perfect for any minecraft lover
customer_reviews.text: solidly built little 'action figures' based on a well loved game. Even when the screens are turned off minecraft can peak the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Corry

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the game
customer_reviews.text: A must have for the minecraft fan. Don't forget the playset. Birch forest was great!
customer_reviews.author: Bpw0614

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these - good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a Christmas gift- he loves it and it takes his Minecraft creative play to another level. He loves the animals and they are perfect for him (and his sister) to play together!
customer_reviews.author: VeggieGIrl13

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the minecraft lover
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the minecraft lover. Love that all the animals are included. The sheep even has bouncy legs which is super awesome as it mirrors the sheep from the game.
customer_reviews.author: Syane

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft imagination play
customer_reviews.text: My almost 5 year old grandson LOVES Minecraft on tablets and phone app. He also has imagination playing with small creatures and animals, so I think he will love playing with these characters. His brother is getting a Minecraft Farm for the holiday, so they can use both together.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of 5

customer_reviews.title: Used as Cake Decor
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find any Minecraft Cake Decor, so I used these. Definitely a good size for a sheet cake. Added plus, unlike some cake decor, grandson is able to play with them long after the party was over. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: good cake topper
customer_reviews.text: my son loved these for his birthday cake.. also ordered Minecraft Survival Pack
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Neal

customer_reviews.title: Ok but overpriced for somewhat silly figurines...
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present so I was willing to pay a little more, but these are nothing special. Plastic, small figurines to play with maybe once or twice... Kinda silly really...
customer_reviews.author: swhite

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old loved these. They’re bigger than I thought. Super cute
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Great durable toy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and a Minecraft necklace for my 5 year old niece. She loves it and her momma says it's still played with on a regular basis. I will be a returnibg customer to this seller for future birthdays and holidays
customer_reviews.author: 🍃💜🍃ToniaB🍃💜🍃

customer_reviews.title: ... this is a cute set to make them very happy. They ARE bigger than all the 3 figure ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a minecraft lover then this is a cute set to make them very happy. They ARE bigger than all the 3 figure sets you see here on Amazon, so just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great as cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a cake topper for my son's 6th birthday Minecraft themed cake. He loved them however post birthday play has resulted in the creeper losing a foot; I suspect this is likely my son playing with it excessively! They seemed pricey to me, but since I knew they would be a birthday present for him as well I didn't mind paying. The look on his face when he saw the finished cake was priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: Big hit.
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my 6 year old grandson. Glad I found them for under $15 though, I wouldn't have been happy with them at a higher price as they are quite small.
customer_reviews.author: judyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I bought two, one for my 6yo to play ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for my 6yo to play and the other for cupcake toppers. I ended up not being able to do the cupcake toppers since my 6yo wanted both. I think he was use to having lots of animals in the game...
customer_reviews.author: Tigerish Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great pack of animals!
customer_reviews.text: Love these animals! Made well and goes with all the other Minecraft figures.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: These just fall apart
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Minecraft, but these just fall apart. We have purchased LEGO Minecraft toys and they don't fall apart. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bloopfish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big hit for Christmas and she likes them. Both my granddaughters are into mine craft.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVED them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my son who is 4 and he absolutely loves them. They're perfect in size, and pretty durable plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They complete the world of Minecraft when my son is playing with Steve and Alex figures.
customer_reviews.author: Voltron

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: You've heard the expression, "they don't make them like they used to", well these are made how they used to. Very happy with the Minecraft animals, will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T. Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birthday Boy!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute mine craft animals. My grandson was so happy when he got these. They were out of stock everywhere at Christmas, but my grandsons birthday in January was perfect to surprise him with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sneeky

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, I don't really get the allure of minecraft. However, millions of kids would disagree with me. These are decently sized figures, much larger than lego figures. They seem fine, but have been sitting on the shelf since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey for what you are getting, but it is Minectaft... The figures are kind of small, but my 8 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my gf's 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my gf's 7 year old boy, for his birthday. He absolutely loves the toys and so does his 5 year old brother. I thought you could take the heads off from another review but I must have misread it.
customer_reviews.author: Another One

customer_reviews.title: Beware of counterfeits.
customer_reviews.text: Fakes. The real version can be taken apart. These are one piece. Looks very authentic but this is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Nostoneunturned

customer_reviews.title: It's really good. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I want to prepare small gifts for my son. He likes small animals better. I'll ask my friend to recommend some good gifts. My friend recommended your products to me. I think I'm satisfied with what I need
customer_reviews.author: William  Beauvais

customer_reviews.title: This was a winner for a 10-year-old who loves Minecraft ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a winner for a 10-year-old who loves Minecraft. He has some other sets, so these were additional playset pieces. Lots of kids at his school are into Minecraft and apparently they play with these sets during recess. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. CarrierTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, stupid expensive.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and the kids love them. They are stupid expensive for what they are, though. I know that's the way minecraft toys are and I played right into their hands by pandering to my child's desire for these darn things, but $15 would be a lot more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: mortie3k

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit at our house!
customer_reviews.text: I have eight children ranging in age from 8 to 19, and all of them love Minecraft. This was a Christmas gift for the 8 year old. Every child in the house was so excited when it was opened. He absolutely loved the collection. I was impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great details & nice job
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my handicap Grandson! Great details & nice job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Minecraft- Animal 6 -Pack
product_meta.description: Color:AnimalsBring Minecraft to life! The fun never ends with the Minecraft Animal Multi-Pack. As passive mobs, these animals pose no harm to the village. They are very helpful providing wool, protection from hostile mobs, transportation and more. (Includes: Chicken, Ocelot, Tame Wolf, Pig, Sheep, & Cow).
feature_bullets: Populate the Overworld with the Minecraft Animal Mobs Multipack
Includes Chicken, Ocelot, Tame Wolf, Pig, Sheep & Cow
Each animal features a pixilated design and are fully articulated
The Minecraft Animal Mobs Multipack is true to the element of the game
The Minecraft Animal 6 Pack is perfect for any Minecraft fan!
Includes: Chicken, Ocelot, Tame Wolf, Pig, Sheep, & Cow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,467 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
